member.name: T:Neumont.Build.Tasks.VsSdkLocator
member.summary: Obtains installation information and locations for the specified version of the Visual Studio SDK.

member.name: P:Neumont.Build.Tasks.VsSdkLocator.RequestedVersion
member.summary: The version of the Visual Studio SDK for which information should be obtained.

member.name: P:Neumont.Build.Tasks.VsSdkLocator.InstallationDirectory
member.summary: The directory into which the specified version of the Visual Studio SDK is installed.

member.name: P:Neumont.Build.Tasks.VsSdkLocator.ToolsDirectory
member.summary: The tools directory for the specified version of the Visual Studio SDK.

member.name: P:Neumont.Build.Tasks.VsSdkLocator.IncludesDirectory
member.summary: The include files directory for the specified version of the Visual Studio SDK.

member.name: P:Neumont.Build.Tasks.VsSdkLocator.RedistributablesDirectory
member.summary: The redistributables directory for the specified version of the Visual Studio SDK.
